course_description: Learn Python from scratch for data and web.

skills.skill_description: Fundamental language for scripting, automation, and data analysis.
Core concepts like variables, control flow, and functions.

Python Basics.module_description: Get started with Python syntax and simple operations.

submodules.submodule_description: Learn how to write valid Python code and store data in variables.
Explore built-in types like strings, numbers, lists, and booleans.
Handle user input and display results in the console.

Control Flow & Functions.module_description: Control execution paths and build reusable code blocks.

submodules.submodule_description: Make decisions in your code with conditional statements.
Automate tasks by iterating over sequences.
Create and invoke functions to organize your code.

Working with Data.module_description: Learn to store, retrieve, and process collections of data.

submodules.submodule_description: Manage ordered and key-value collections in Python.
Read from and write to text and CSV files on your computer.
Perform simple transformations and summaries on datasets.
